# stream_chunk

The `StreamChunk` class for handling streamed chunks from LLM calls.

## <ApiType type="Alias" path="responses/stream_chunk/index" symbolName="Dataclass" /> Dataclass

## <ApiType type="Class" path="responses/stream_chunk/index" symbolName="StreamChunk" /> StreamChunk

A chunk of a streaming response from an LLM.
